public class MountedApi extends Mounted
A JAR file mounted on a path. The JAR will be run in a child process on the specified port. Requests will be forwarded by handleRequest(HttpMethod, JettyMicroservletRequestCycle) to the child process.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
